text: "Murder on My Mind" (also known by the censored name "Mischief on My Mind") is the third single off of American rapper YNW Melly's first mixtape I Am You. The song was released on June 1, 2018. The song was able to make it to #14 on the Billboard Hot 100, #7 on the Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs and is certified 6Ã— Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song is about a murder and the victims last moments. Melly said that made the chorus when he was 16 while he was sitting in jail. The song became viral when Melly was charged for double murder on February 13, 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Murder on My Mind" on YouTube Category:2017 songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Murder on My Mind
